diet_note:
Before making your course choices make sure you have discussed them with your Student Adviser, or someone in your student support team.

NOTE: This programme is available to study part-time. Part-time students must complete the same requirements as full-time students over two academic years with the following rule: Informatics Project Proposal INFR11147 (IPP) must be completed during Year 2. The dissertation will be completed in Block 5+ of Year 2 after progression to the dissertation stage has been confirmed by the Board of Examiners.

1.course_note: These are Cognitive Science courses at level 11 open to taught postgraduate students.

2.course_type: Informatics and PPLS MSc Programming Courses
2.course_note: These are programming courses at Level 11 open to taught postgraduate students. Note that enrolment in some of these courses may be subject to quotas.

3.course_note: These are AI Applications and Paradigms courses at Level 11 open to taught postgraduate students.

4.course_note: These are Machine Learning Foundations and Methods courses at Level 11 open to taught postgraduate students.

5.course_note: These are other level 11 Informatics courses open to postgraduate students.

1.course_type: Level 10 courses in Schedules O and P
1.course_note: These are Informatics and Maths courses at level 10 open to postgraduate students.

2.course_type: Level 11 courses in the School of Philosophy, Psychology and Language Sciences
2.course_note: These are level 11 PPLS courses that are open to postgraduate students. See the MSc Handbook for suggested options for MSc in Cognitive Science.
